resources.string: SMS sent from SIM card %s to activate \"Find device\"
SIM card activation was canceled. Activation is triggered by \"%1$s\".
SIM card %2$d activation was canceled. Activation is triggered by \"%1$s\".
Activated SIM card %2$d successfully. Activation is triggered by \"%1$s\".
SMS has been sent during the activation.
Activated SIM card successfully. Activation is triggered by \"%1$s\".
Created Mi Account using SIM %d successfully
2 international text messages will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier.
To activate %2$s, %1$d international SMS will be sent. Your carrier will charge you for these messages.
2 regular text messages will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier.
To activate %2$s, %1$d regular SMS will be sent. Your carrier will charge you for these messages.
"Can't find your phone number. Make sure that your SIM card has been activated. Enter the phone number associated with your new SIM card to reactivate %s."
"Couldn't send activation message. Make sure that your SIM card has been activated. Enter the phone number associated with your new SIM card to reactivate %s."
Invalid IMEI. Tap to try again.
The phone number you entered is invalid.
"Can't find your phone number. Make sure that your SIM card has been activated."
"Couldn't check phone number. Make sure SIM %d works properly and try again."
Make sure the phone number you entered is correct and that your SIM card has been activated.
"Couldn't send activation message. Make sure that your SIM card has been activated."
Check your network connection and try again.
A server error occurred. Check your network settings and try again.
An activation SMS may be sent after you switch SIM cards.
%1$s. To activate %3$s, enter the phone number of SIM %2$d. If you replace this SIM card, another activation SMS will be sent.
International SMS will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier.
To activate %2$s, %1$d international SMS will be sent. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
%1$s. Refer to the Mi Account User Manual if you have any questions.
2 text messages (regular and international) will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier.
To activate %3$s, %1$d regular and %2$d international SMS will be sent. Your carrier will charge you for these messages.
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. 2 international text messages will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier."
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. 2 regular text messages will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier."
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. International SMS will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier."
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. 2 text messages (regular and international) will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier."
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. Regular SMS will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier."
"Looks like you've switched SIM cards. Enter current phone number to activate %s."
An outgoing SMS message may be required to create your Mi Account. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
An outgoing international SMS message may be required to create your Mi Account. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
Regular SMS will be sent to activate %s. You will be charged by the carrier.
Enter current phone number to activate %s.
To activate %2$s, enter the phone number of SIM %1$d.
To activate %2$s, %1$d regular SMS will be sent. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
"VoIP service supported by Weihui. View Weihui's"

Xiaomi SIM Activation Service needs permission to send SMS
"Can't activate SIM card. Make sure your balance is sufficient."

To activate %s, your device needs permissions to send activation SMS. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
To turn on %s, Xiaomi Service Framework will send SMS to verify your phone number. You will be charged for the regular SMS by the carrier.
Allow %1$s to get your phone number (%2$s)?
Allow %1$s to get your phone number
"%1$s won't get your phone number. It will just make sure the number is valid. Agree?"
Allow %1$s to verify your phone number
Activation requires granting authorization so that Messaging could get your phone number.
Allow this service to access your phone number first.

After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting your data and delete all your data from its servers. Sync with Xiaomi Cloud, Mi Message, and other Messaging features will no longer be available. Revoke authorization anyway?
"Couldn't activate service. Tap to try again."
"This service isn't activated. Tap to try again."
